path.style: stroke: url("#gradient-0"); fill-rule: nonzero; fill: url("#gradient-1"); paint-order: fill;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; transform-origin: 509.316px 302.001px;
